titles.title: Wireless Innovation Act of 2007
To require the FCC to issue a final order regarding television white spaces.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Telecommunications and the Internet.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E796)

bill.summary:
3/20/2007--Introduced.
Wireless Innovation Act of 2007 - Directs the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) to complete its proceeding and issue a final order in the Matter of Unlicensed Operation in the TV Broadcast Bands, ET Docket No. 04-186, which facilitates the operation of unlicensed devices in television white spaces.
